nodes.bodyText: I think AlluxioCatalog also needs this: https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/blob/master/table/server/master/src/main/java/alluxio/master/table/AlluxioCatalog.java#L390

Instead of 1 table iterator and partition list, should we just have a table iterator, and partition iterator? Everything the partition iterator is empty() we just move on to the next table and get the next partition iterator?
It seems like mixing an iterator and a list is a bit confusing to follow.
I changed to add partitionIterator directly in the existing getTableIterator to be cleaner and safer. PTAL
Is it perfectly fine output all the tables and then all the individual partition batches?
The table iterator change to include partition iterators so they are now placed together. This way seems to be safer
What does this comment mean? What is being removed?
can we also add the # partitions we are adding in the message?
